articles.title: DPRK FM Warns U.S. Frantic to Fabricate Harshest Ever "Sanctions Resolution"
articles.content:
DPRK FM Warns U.S. Frantic to Fabricate Harshest Ever "Sanctions Resolution"
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea Monday released the following statement:
					 The sanctions and pressure racket of the U.S. to completely obliterate the DPRK's sovereignty and right to existence is reaching an extremely reckless phase.
					
					 The U.S. is going frantic to fabricate the harshest ever "sanctions resolution" by manipulating the United Nations Security Council (UNSC) over the DPRK's ICBM mountable H-bomb test.
					
					 The DPRK has developed and perfected the super-powerful thermo-nuclear weapon as a means to deter the ever-increasing hostile moves and nuclear threat of the U.S. and defuse the danger of nuclear war looming over the Korean peninsula and the region.
					
					 However, instead of making a right choice based on rational analysis of the overall situation, the U.S. is trying to use the DPRK's legitimate self-defensive measures as an excuse to strangle and completely suffocate it.
					
					 Since the U.S. is revealing its nature as a blood-thirsty beast obsessed with the wild dream of reversing the DPRK's development of the state nuclear force which has already reached the completion phase, there is no way that the DPRK is going to wait and let the U.S. feast on it.
					
					 The DPRK is closely following the moves of the U.S. with vigilance.
					
					 In case the U.S. eventually does rig up the illegal and unlawful "resolution" on harsher sanctions, the DPRK shall make absolutely sure that the U.S. pays due price.
					
					 The DPRK is ready and willing to use any form of ultimate means.
					
					 The forthcoming measures to be taken by the DPRK will cause the U.S. the greatest pain and suffering it had ever gone through in its entire history.
					
					 The world will witness how the DPRK tames the U.S. gangsters by taking series of action tougher than they have ever envisaged.
					
					 The U.S. should be fully aware that as long as it persists with intense political, economic and military confrontation with the DPRK in defiance of its repeated stern warning, the former will never be able to avoid its permanent extinction.

articles.title: Kanji Inoki Leaves for Home
articles.content:
Kanji Inoki Leaves for Home
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors of Japan, and his party went back on Monday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Congratulates Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Congratulates Syrian President
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Monday sent a message of greeting to Bashar Al-Assad, president of Syria.
					 In the message he extended his warm congratulation and militant greeting to the Syrian president on his 52nd birthday.
					
					 Expressing firm belief that the Syrian army and people would win the final victory in the struggle for sovereignty, security and territorial integrity of the country, he wished the Syrian president good health and success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Delegation of Korean Women's Union in Japan Feted
articles.content:
Delegation of Korean Women's Union in Japan Feted
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- A reception, provided by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, was given in honor of the delegation for marking the 70th anniversary of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan at the People's Palace of Culture Monday.
					 Present on invitation were the delegation for marking the 70th anniversary of the Democratic Women's Union led by Kim Il Sun, adviser of its Central Standing Committee and a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 69th anniversary of the DPRK and other compatriots from Japan.
					
					 Kim Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jin Guk, director of the Agency of Overseas Korean Affairs, and officials concerned were on hand.
					
					 Kim Yong Chol said in his speech that the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan has triumphed and displayed its honor despite the strong tempest of history for a long period under the leadership and care of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed belief that the officials of the women's union and Korean women in Japan would reliably display their honorable responsibility and mission in a drive for ushering in a fresh heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan in the great era of Kim Jong Un bearing in mind the faith that they would surely triumph led by him.
					
					 Kim Il Sun noted in her speech that Kim Jong Un invited the delegation to the homeland on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the Democratic Women's Union and showed loving care for it.
					
					 She stressed that officials of the women's union and Korean women in Japan would more vigorously advance the movement of Korean women in Japan, true to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un as Juche-oriented overseas women's organization which has grown up under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Delegation of Korean Women in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Korean Women in Japan Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation for marking the 70th anniversary of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan led by Kim Il Sun, adviser of its Central Standing Committee, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Members of the delegation went round the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum where the historic data and mementoes showing the revolutionary activities of the President and his family members are displayed.
					
					 At the old home, they looked round relics preserved with much care, being briefed on the fact that the President was born into a patriotic and revolutionary family and grew up while nurturing ardent patriotism and high ambition of revolution.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Chilgol Revolutionary Site, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, the Kumkhop General Foodstuff Factory for Sportspeople and etc.

articles.title: World First Aid Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
World First Aid Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- An event took place here on Monday to observe World First Aid Day.
					 Present there were officials of the DPRK Red Cross Society, young RC volunteers and members of delegations of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the International Committee of the Red Cross active in the DPRK and staff members of foreign embassies and international body missions here.
					
					 The theme of the event is "First aid at home".
					
					 At the end of the event its participants enjoyed an art performance given by young RC volunteers.

articles.title: National Exhibition of IT Successes 2017 Opens in DPRK
articles.content:
National Exhibition of IT Successes 2017 Opens in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- The national exhibition of IT successes 2017 opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House here on Monday.
					 On display there are IT successes and products presented by several hundred units, including commissions, ministries, national institutions, provincial people's committees, industrial establishments and IT units.
					
					 The exhibition, divided into five panels such as IT industry and IT education, will be held in forms of exhibition, presentation of new products and technologies and IT exchange and service.
					
					 It will examine the sci-tech successes made in the course of putting industrial establishments on an IT basis, and their economic efficiency and introduction and select model IT-based units, the ten best IT enterprises and the ten best IT products.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, leading officials of commissions, ministries and national institutions, officials concerned and officials of those units participating in the exhibition.

articles.title: 9th National Exhibition of University Scientific Research Successes Opens
articles.content:
9th National Exhibition of University Scientific Research Successes Opens
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- The 9th national exhibition of university scientific research successes opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex here on Monday.
					 On display there are more than 2,000 successes made by researchers and students of 90-odd universities in the capital and local areas.
					
					 Exchanged at the exhibition, divided into more than 20 panels including electronics and automation, geo-technology and global environment, will be experience and technological achievements made in the work of recent years to realize the integration of education, scientific research and production.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University who doubles as minister of Higher Education, officials concerned and university researchers and students.

articles.title: Nuclear Weapon Developers Leave Pyongyang amid Warm Send-off
articles.content:
Nuclear Weapon Developers Leave Pyongyang amid Warm Send-off
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Nuclear weapon developers went back Monday after their stay in Pyongyang.
					 Those who contributed to the success in the H-bomb for ICBM were seen off by leading officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea including Ri Man Gon and Hong Sung Mu.
					
					 The streets were lively as crowds sent militant greetings to the praiseworthy heroes of the nation with bouquets, and as cheerful peasant dances were presented, and loud songs played by students' brass bands resounded.
					
					 As the line of buses with scientists and technicians in the nuclear field aboard entered University Street, teaching staff and students of Pyongyang University of Architecture, Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, and workers of the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill and the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory warmly saw them off, sending militant encouragement.
					
					 As the buses entered Changjon Crossroads, loud songs like "We Will Go to Mt Paektu" and "We Are Mallima Riders" blared and members of the women's union presented dances with red flags.
					
					 In the streets where "Song of Advance of Socialism" reverberated, officials of ministries and national institutions and sportspersons shook bouquets to warmly see off those who performed feats.
					
					 Songs like "Korea, Go Forward, Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts", "Advancing Socialism" and "Let's Run toward Future" resounded far and wide in the streets in the capital city.
					
					 People from all walks of life and youths and students waved bouquets wherever the buses passed.
					
					 The nuclear weapon developers acknowledged the citizens.

articles.title: More Army-People Rallies Hail Success in H-bomb Test
articles.content:
More Army-People Rallies Hail Success in H-bomb Test
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies were held in more cities and counties to hail the complete success in the test of H-bomb for ICBM carried out under the Workers' Party of Korea's plan for building a strategic nuclear force.
					 Present there were officials of local party and power organs, working people's organizations, factories and enterprises, farms and universities, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working citizens of all social standings, youths and students.
					
					 The speakers at the rallies described the detonation of thermonuclear weapon ahead of the 69th birthday of the DPRK as a great event that gives the army and the people redoubled faith and courage.
					
					 They stressed it is a precious fruition of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's courage and pluck and unremitting patriotic devotion as well as of the do-or-die fighting spirit of the defense scientists boundlessly loyal to the Party's cause.
					
					 It is a great victory of the WPK's line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force and a historic victory of all the Korean people who threw in their lot and shared the idea and breath with the Party, they said.
					
					 The participants in the rallies expressed their resolve to more strikingly display the might of Juche nuclear power by speeding up the grand advance of self-reliance.

articles.title: Brisk Sci-tech Service for Persons with Disabilities
articles.content:
Brisk Sci-tech Service for Persons with Disabilities
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- The sci-tech service for the disabled is brisk at the Sci-Tech Complex in the DPRK.
					 The complex issues reader cards for the disabled so that they can get sci-tech service at the reading room without inconvenience.
					
					 It set up the state-run network for the disabled to give them all the data of various fields including education, culture and public health and tele-education of universities.
					
					 The complex also set up a questioning and answering program to render service to persons with disabilities at home.
					
					 It is setting up sign language videos and e-books on the homepage for the disabled in connection with the Grand People's Study House and the Central Committee of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled.
					
					 Kim Yong Il, an official of the complex, told KCNA that they would better the sci-tech service for the disabled, thus making them get benefit from the people-oriented policy of the socialist system.

articles.title: Hero Sinam Senior Middle School Famous for Ssirum
articles.content:
Hero Sinam Senior Middle School Famous for Ssirum
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Hero Sinam Senior Middle School in Ryongchon County, North Phyongan Province, the DPRK is well known for ssirum (Korean wrestling).
					 It won the title again at the team and catch-weight matches of the Ssirum event at the 43rd National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize held some days ago.
					
					 The school has directed primary efforts to implanting the soul and spirit of the Korean nation in the minds of the members of the ssirum group and made a big stride in acquiring basic technology and skill of ssirum by applying scientific training methods suited to their ages and psychological feature.
					
					 The Korean people are fond of ssirum, the nation's traditional game, as it is militant and its methods are various and it helps build up patience, fighting spirit and Herculean strength.

articles.title: Might of Popular Masses Is Based on Unity: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Might of Popular Masses Is Based on Unity: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article that the might of the popular masses is just the power of unity and it is the truth of history that when they go united, they will win but they will lose when they go dispersed.
					 The candlelight demonstration, which swept the whole of south Korea last year, clearly proved that the decisive might capable of resolutely punishing the group of traitors who are hell-bent on acts of treachery while trampling down the desire and demand of the people lies in the unity of the popular masses, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean people's candlelight demonstration was an eruption of the long pent-up grudge and resentment against the Park Geun Hye group which pursued fascist dictatorship, unpopular policies and confrontation with the fellow countrymen while kowtowing to the outsiders.
					
					 If the people's vigilance and fighting spirit get weak, the group of traitors is bound to raise their heads again. A new society desired by the people of various circles in south Korea can be built only through a steady and staunch struggle.
					
					 Only the unity is an essential way for liquidating the heinous and treacherous forces that have trampled down the popular masses' dignity and democratic rights.
					
					 Today the conservative forces are making desperate efforts to regain their position and retake power in south Korea.
					
					 The prevailing situation calls upon the south Korean people from all walks of life to mercilessly smash the conservative group working hard to escape from the abyss of ruin and achieve the broad unity for new politics and life.

articles.title: Newspapers Deride S. Korean Regime's Foolish Deed
articles.content:
Newspapers Deride S. Korean Regime's Foolish Deed
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK in commentaries on Monday denounce the south Korean puppet forces for going reckless over the DPRK's successful ICBM-ready H-bomb test conducted to cope with the U.S. threat of aggression.
					 Shortly ago, the puppet forces staged various exercises of the three services, crying out for "strong military counteraction" in league with the U.S. Meanwhile, they are begging their American master to deploy more nuclear strategic assets in south Korea.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun flails such moves as bellicose deed that can be done only by the traitors who are working hard to kick off a war against the north through cooperation with outsiders, harboring extreme bad blood towards the compatriots.
					
					 It says:
					
					 It is the unanimous public opinion at home and abroad that the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula is worse than the DPRK-U.S. showdown in the 1990s.
					
					 The puppet warmongers, however, are staging war drills against the north and begging the U.S. to deploy its nuclear strategic assets in south Korea while talking about "strong military counteraction" in disregard of the prevailing touch-and-go situation on the peninsula.
					
					 They are sadly mistaken if they think that the U.S. will protect south Korea, suffering big casualties and huge material losses.
					
					 It is a foolish act to take part in a war which they have no chance of winning.
					
					 The puppet warmongers should not gamble over the fate of the south Korean people.
					
					 Minju Joson urges the south Korean authorities to properly face up the meaning of the DPRK's successful H-bomb test and the present political trend and stop their useless confrontation moves that will bring a serious disaster to them.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lashes out at Japan's Ridiculous Burlesque
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lashes out at Japan's Ridiculous Burlesque
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson in a commentary Monday blames the Japanese reactionaries for playing a disgusting farce over the DPRK's fire of intermediate-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-12.
					 The Japanese reactionaries made much fuss over the DPRK's strategic rocket which recently flew over Japan and dropped in the Pacific, asking for an urgent meeting of the United Nations Security Council and staging an evacuation drill of citizens.
					
					 In a word, their argument is that the DPRK's strategic ballistic rocket was a serious "threat" to the security of their territory and citizens, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Hwasong-12 launching drill had no adverse impact on the security of neighboring countries.
					
					 However, Japan was so crazy in anti-DPRK racket as to make such senseless argument.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' main purpose with regard to the DPRK's successful rocket launch is to realize their old dream of invading the continent, being backed by the U.S.
					
					 As a caravan goes despite dogs barking, no matter how desperately Japan may beat its old drum of "threat" and "provocation", the DPRK's rockets are to exactly fly toward their preset targets.
					
					 Japan should abandon its bad habit of recklessly wagging tongue, facing up to the reality. It is well advised not to make such suicidal deed as putting its head before the DPRK's rockets.

articles.title: Washington Should Pay Heed to Public Opinion
articles.content:
Washington Should Pay Heed to Public Opinion
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- The news of the DPRK's perfect success in the ICBM-ready H-bomb test created a great sensation across the world.
					 Against this backdrop, media of different countries are highly praising the exploits respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un performed in the building of a state nuclear force.
					
					 The Brazilian internet news G1 commented as follows on Sept. 4:
					
					 Clear was what the DPRK's another nuke explosion meant. It is that Leader Kim Jong Un won a victory.
					
					 He has turned his country into a nuclear power.
					
					 Now that Kim Jong Un has taken the initiative in essence, the U.S. has come to the conclusion that it can never sleep a sound sleep.
					
					 The chief of the defense research office of the Center for the National Interests of the U.S., in a commentary contributed to the political news journal National Interest on September 3, noted that the recent successful nuclear test clearly proved that the supreme leader of north Korea is a sturdy leader who does anything without fail once he is determined to do.
					
					 Notable in those opinions is the claim strongly urging the U.S. administration to make a U-turn in its policy toward the DPRK by facing up to the situation from the acknowledgment that the mechanical structure between the DPRK and the U.S. and the world political structure have undergone a complete change.
					
					 Western media like AP, ABC, Washington Post, Reuters, Independent and AFP, commenting on the statement of the Nuclear Weapons Institute of the DPRK on Sept. 3, asserted that the H-bomb test directly hit Trump who has hesitated in tackling the Korean issue. The event showed that the structure of the confrontation between the U.S. and the DPRK has completely changed and the U.S. and its allies have no way to check the DPRK's rapid development of nuclear weapons.
					
					 Noting that the nuclear bomb test of north Korea proved that Washington's north Korea policy has come to a real flop, Germany's radio Deutsche Welle said on Sept. 4:
					
					 The H-bomb test conducted by the DPRK was the bitterest moment for the U.S. A bomb like that is powerful enough to reduce New York to ashes.
					
					 The U.S. strategy to halt the DPRK's nuclear and missile programs through sanctions has come to a failure. If the U.S. escalates sanctions and waits for its effect, the DPRK will get more time to complete its missile program. The U.S. is now the loser on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Trump only reveals his true colors as paper tiger whenever he twitters against the DPRK.
					
					 A commentary contributed to the newspaper of Hong Kong of China South China Morning Post by its correspondent in New York termed the denuclearization of the DPRK and a preemptive attack on it unrealistic. It urged the U.S. to think of a new and realistic policy now that its goal for denuclearizing the DPRK has proved futile.
					
					 U.S. politicians are needed to have the stance of heeding the public opinion.
					
					 That will help them clear their confusion and secure a way out.

articles.title: No-THAAD Action Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
No-THAAD Action Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Residents in the THAAD base and its vicinity, believers of Won Buddhism and citizens from across south Korea held a press conference in denunciation of the authorities enforcing additional deployment of THAAD on Sept. 7, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 In a press release the participants said that the "government" betrayed the people and THAAD deployment would be remembered as evil of the present "government".
					
					 It declared that they would struggle until THAAD is withdrawn in protest against the authorities no better than the Park Geun Hye regime.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Deploying THAAD
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Deploying THAAD
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Progressive parties and organizations of south Korea strongly denounced the regime for introducing additional THAAD equipment at the prodding of the U.S. on Sept. 7.
					 The representative of the Jongui Party at a meeting that day accused the chief executive of failing to preserve the stand opposed to the deployment of THAAD he took during the "presidential election", terming THAAD an evil left by the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 The Popular Coalition Party in a commentary expressed the will to stage actions for getting THAAD withdrawn for peace on the Korean peninsula and public interests, noting it can never pardon the regime's introduction of THAAD.
					
					 The Green Party in a commentary urged the "president" to apologize to the citizens opposed to the deployment.
					
					 The Confederation of Trade Unions in a commentary said the chief executive should be held accountable for the deployment, accusing him of enforcing the deployment by mobilizing thousands of police troops at night.
					
					 The Solidarity for Progress released a statement to censure the regime.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Regional Body's Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Regional Body's Website
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- The African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People headquartered in Nigeria on Sep. 1 posted on its website the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" on the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The work, published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that an outstanding leader assures the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to glorify the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Foreign Organizations Hail DPRK's Successful H-bomb Test
articles.content:
Foreign Organizations Hail DPRK's Successful H-bomb Test
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different countries released statements on September 3 and 4 in support of the DPRK's successful test of H-bomb for ICBM.
					 The Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said:
					
					 We warmly congratulate the DPRK on its perfect success in the test of H-bomb for ICBM that serves as a very significant occasion in attaining the final goal for completing the state nuclear force.
					
					 The DPRK demonstrated its strategic position once again under the wise guidance of Comrade Kim Jong Un, the great successor to the Songun revolutionary idea of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The U.S. should recognize the strength of the DPRK possessed of H-bomb, the might of the Songun politics and the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, and renounce its hostile policy.
					
					 The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK and the Regional Social Organization of Russia "Borozino" in their statements said that the DPRK gave a counterattack to the war policy of the U.S.-led hostile forces this time and showed in practice how the sovereignty of a country should be defended.
					
					 The statements stressed that the DPRK's ballistic rocket test-fire and H-bomb test were part of its self-defensive steps to protect the country and the people from the hostile forces' military blackmail and that the U.S. should be mindful that the DPRK has possessed not only delivery means but also nuclear weapons including modern H-bomb.
					
					 The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association in its statement appealed to all countries around the world to demand that the U.S. stop its nuclear threat against the DPRK at once and replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace accord.

articles.title: Foreign Media Sneer at U.S. Upset by DPRK Attack
articles.content:
Foreign Media Sneer at U.S. Upset by DPRK Attack
 Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Congolese and Cambodian media sneered at the U.S. floundering in the face of the might of the DPRK which is bolstering up its self-defensive military capabilities while resolutely foiling the unprecedented sanctions and pressure.
					 The Congolese news agency said in an article posted on its internet homepage September 2:
					
					 The U.S. does not find any countermeasure, upset by the continuous hard blows from the DPRK.
					
					 From an objective view, the outcome of the DPRK-U.S. nuclear confrontation has been already settled.
					
					 The Trump administration persists in the outdated policy towards the DPRK, instead of drawing a lesson from the strategic failures of the preceding American administrations.
					
					 The DPRK has consistently held fast to the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of a nuclear force without any vacillation or deviation to cope with the U.S. unchanged scheme for aggression.
					
					 It is only the DPRK which has stood against the U.S. styling itself the "only superpower" of the world.
					
					 This fact indicates that the DPRK has made all military and technological preparations with pluck and grit.
					
					 The Cambodian State Radio reported on August 25 as follows:
					
					 Recently the nuclear confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. has become an urgent problem in the global political arena.
					
					 The DPRK continuously develops diversified nuclear attack means at an astonishing speed, while the U.S. is getting nervous in its moves to hold this in check.
					
					 Citing detailed data to show it was none other than the U.S. which pushed the DPRK to have access to nukes, the radio further said:
					
					 The U.S. is in deep quagmire by the DPRK's access to nukes and measures for bolstering up the nuclear force, though the former put strong pressure on the latter.
					
					 It would be a wise act for the U.S. to treat in a co-existence stand the DPRK which rapidly rose up as a nuclear power.
					
					 The DPRK proved that it has already possessed all nuclear equipment and means at the ultra-modern level and got even capability to practically strike the U.S. mainland.
					
					 The U.S. should think twice over its behavior.

articles.title: Cancilleria coreana advierte a las maniobras de EE.UU. por inventar la peor "resolucion de sancion"
articles.content:
Cancilleria coreana advierte a las maniobras de EE.UU. por inventar la peor "resolucion de sancion"
Pyongyang, 11 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 11 una declaracion que senala:
					Se llegan al nivel extremadamente imprudente las maniobras de sancion y aplastamiento de EE.UU. para exterminar completamente la soberania y el derecho a subsistencia de la RPDC.
					
					Ahora, bajo el pretexto de la prueba de bomba H instalable en el ICBM, EE.UU. maniobra con frenesi para inventar la peor "resolucion de sancion" en la historia abusando del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Desarrollamos y perfeccionamos el superpotente arma termonuclear como remedio para detener las crecientes maniobras hostiles y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. y prevenir el peligro de guerra nuclear creado en la Peninsula Coreana y region.
					
					Pero, EE.UU. trata de usar la justa medida de autodefensa de la RPDC como pretexto para asfixiar totalmente la RPDC en vez de hacer la justa opcion viendo correctamente la corriente de la situacion.
					
					No podemos estar con brazos cruzados ante la realidad en que EE.UU. muestra su naturaleza de bestia abrigando la ilusion de revertir el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC que esta en la etapa final.
					
					Ahora, observamos agudamente la conducta de EE.UU.
					
					Si el pais norteamericano fabrica al fin y al cabo la "resolucion de sancion" mas brutal e ilegal en el CS de la ONU, la RPDC hara decididamente que el pagara el precio correspondiente.
					
					Estamos listos para hacer cualquier medida ultima.
					
					Las medidas siguientes a ser tomadas por la RPDC afligiran mas a EE.UU.
					
					El mundo vera claramente como la RPDC controla con las poderosas y sucesivas medidas de accion al imperio yanqui.
					
					EE.UU. debe tener presente que no podra evitar la derrota irreparable si recurre a la extremada confrontacion politica, economica y militar pese a las reiteradas advertencias serias de la RPDC.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion coreana pronuncia discurso en reunion ministerial de Asia-Pacifico
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion coreana pronuncia discurso en reunion ministerial de Asia-Pacifico
Pyongyang, 11 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El ministro de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental, Kim Kyong Jun, quien preside la delegacion del Ministerio de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, pronuncio el dia 7 un discurso en la reunion ministerial de la region de Asia-Pacifico sobre el ambiente y el desarrollo, efectuada en Tailandia. 
					El orador menciono que desde hace mucho tiempo el gobierno de la RPDC vino prestando profunda atencion a la proteccion ambiental y alcanza muchos exitos en este trabajo. 
					
					La proteccion medioambiental no es un asunto limitado a un pais y nacion, dijo e insistio en asegurar la unanimidad de accion para convertir el globo terraqueo en el planeta descontaminado.
					
					En este contexto es muy lamentable que EE.UU. haya tomado la resolucion de retirarse de un convenio importante, acordado por todo el mundo, anteponiendo su propio interes y el calculo economico excesivo, acoto.
					
					Critico que las "resoluciones de sancion" de EE.UU., siendo productos de su despotismo y arbitrariedades, infringen gravemente el derecho a la subsistencia y al desarrollo del pueblo coreano, ejercen las influencias negativas a la cooperacion internacional en el domino medioambiental y no se promueven todavia en la RPDC los trabajos de cooperacion que brindan el Programa Ambiental de la ONU y la Organizacion de las Naciones Unidas para el Desarrollo Industrial.
					
					La proteccion medioambiental y la cooperacion internacional en este dominio devienen labores globales y no deben ser victimas de la politica a favor de los intereses de los paises individuales, subrayo y agrego que esto es la posicion de la RPDC. 
					
					Prosiguio que la Comision Economica y Social para Asia y el Pacifico de la ONU y el Programa Ambiental de la ONU deben prestar atencion merecida a tomar las medidas necesarias para que la sancion anti-RPDC no afecte a la cooperacion internacional en la rama medioambiental.
					
					Expreso su esperanza de que la Comision Economica y Social para Asia y el Pacifico de la ONU y el Programa Ambiental de la ONU cumpliran satisfactoriamente con su responsabilidad y papel en coordinar la cooperacion regional para el planeta sin contaminacion y el incremento de economia verde conveniente a la meta de desarrollo sostenible y ofrecer la colaboracion imparcial a todos los paises miembros.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena farsa pueril de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena farsa pueril de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 11 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En un comentario individual difundido este lunes, el periodico Minju Joson denuncio a los reaccionarios japoneses que desarrollan la farsa pueril con motivo del lanzamiento del cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance Hwasong-12 de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 Los reaccionarios japoneses armaron alborotos demandando la convocacion urgente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y librando la evacuacion, como si hubieran caido en su propia tierra los cohetes balisticos estrategicos de la RPDC, que alcanzaron al Pacifico mas alla de Japon, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Ellos insisten en que los proyectiles de la RPDC "amenazaron" gravemente la seguridad de su territorio y sus habitantes.
					
					  Pero, el entrenamiento del lanzamiento de Hwasong-12 de la RPDC no ejercio ninguna influencia sobre la seguridad de los Estados vecinos.
					
					  Sin embargo, Japon enloquecido por la campana anti-RPDC, lanza las tonterias.
					
					  El objetivo principal de tal farsa absurda de los reaccionarios japoneses reside en realizar a toda costa el viejo sueno de la agresion al continente bajo el amparo de EE.UU.
					
					  Por mucho que habla Japon de la "amenaza" y la "provocacion", los cohetes de la RPDC volaran exactamente hacia su blanco.
					
					  Japon debe dejar malos habitos de cuestionar a la RPDC y sus actos suicidas.

articles.title: EE.UU. debe prestar oidos a la opinion publica del mundo, insiste ACNC
articles.content:
EE.UU. debe prestar oidos a la opinion publica del mundo, insiste ACNC
Pyongyang, 11 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La noticia sobre la exitosa prueba de la bomba H instalable en el cohete balistico internacional, recien realizada por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, produce grandes sensaciones en el mundo.
					Numerosos medios de prensa transmiten en gran medida las proezas del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un realizadas por la construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado.
					
					En un comentario fechado 4 la agencia noticiera online brasilena G1 transmitio que es simple el sentido de la explosion de la nueva ojiva nuclear de la RPDC, o sea, significa el triunfo del Dirigente Kim Jong Un quien convirtio su pais en una potencia nuclear.
					
					Y concluyo que EE.UU. no puede dormir a pierna suelta, ya que el Dirigente Kim Jong Un toma la iniciativa. 
					
					El jefe de la oficina de investigacion de defensa del Centro para los Intereses Nacionales de EE.UU. divulgo el dia 3 un comentario en la revista politica National Interest enfatizando que "la exitosa prueba nuclear de la RPDC comprobo claramente que el Maximo Dirigente del Norte de Corea es el lider perfecto que cumple sin falta lo todo decidido". 
					
					En particular, la opinion publica mundial estima que EE.UU. debe cambiar la politica de hostilidad a la RPDC reconociendo el cambio de las estructuras de correlaciones entre los dos paises y de politica mundial. 
					
					El pasado dia 3, la agencia noticiera AP, la radio ABC, el periodico Washington Post, la agencia noticiera Reuter, el rotativo Independent, la agencia noticiera AFP y otros medios de prensa occidentales transmitieron la declaracion del Instituto de Armas Nucleares de la RPDC calificandola de proyectil de impacto directo al presidente estadounidense Trump que toma la posicion irresuelta en el trato del problema coreano y reportaron que el presente acontecimiento muestra que se ha cambiado completamente la estructura de confrontacion EE.UU.-RPDC y que el imperio americano y sus aliados no tienen el remedio para frenar el desarrollo de armas nucleares del pais socialista. 
					
					El dia 4, una radio alemana transmitio que "la prueba de explosion nuclear del Norte de Corea evidencio el fracaso total de la politica hostil de EE.UU.", y continuo:
					
					La reciente prueba de explosion de bomba H fue un momento amargo para EE.UU. Una bomba como esta es de sobra para convertir en un monton de cenizas a Nueva York.
					
					Quedo fracasada la estrategia norteamericana de acabar con el plan nuclear y de misil de la RPDC mediante la sancion. Mientras EE.UU. intensifica ininterrumpidamente la sancion esperando su eficacia, su rival socialista gana mucho mas tiempo para la perfeccion del desarrollo de misil. 
					
					Ahora, EE.UU. fue derrotado en la Peninsula Coreana. Cada vez que Trump inserta en Twitter el articulo de contenido anti-RPDC, se revela su naturaleza como tigre de papel. 
					
					En el comentario insertado el dia 5 en el periodico South China Morning Post, el corresponsal de Hong Kong de China en Nueva York estimo que la desnuclearizacion de Corea y el ataque preventivo contra esta son proyectos irrealistas y acoto que EE.UU. debe idear una nueva politica realista, ya que fue fracasado su objeto de desnuclearizar la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Los politiqueros estadounidenses necesitan tomar una posicion de escuchar con atencion el consejo ajeno. 
					
					Esto dara ayuda, aunque sea minima, a arreglar su pensamiento confundido y buscar el salidero.
